body:
Look, i know that mentioning other servers is like a sin on Avicus, but I've been really wanting to take another crack at Factions lately after some wild attempts before that had various outcomes, so if you have ANY factions server that is brilliant/fair/fun/NON-OP please suggest it in comments.
Thanks guys :)

EDIT: to avoid conflict with mods, don't say IP,  just say the server name and ill get the IP online :)
